etymology.description: 信义 + 区 = district named for the virtues of trust and righteousness.
etymology.interpretation: Administrative district of Taipei City, Taiwan, literally “Integrity District.” Functions as a proper name, though it echoes Confucian virtues (xìn ‘trustworthiness’ and yì ‘righteousness’).
etymology.simplification: 義 → 义 simplifies the complex character by reducing components; 區 → 区 adopts a streamlined form. Both follow PRC simplification to reduce stroke count.

examples.chinese: 我们住在台北市信义区(我們住在臺北市信義區)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen zhù zài Táiběi Shì Xìnyì Qū.
examples.english: We live in Xinyi District, Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 信义区有台北101(信義區有臺北101)。
examples.pinyin: Xìnyì Qū yǒu Táiběi yī líng yī.

examples.chinese: 坐捷运到信义区很方便(坐捷運到信義區很方便)。
examples.pinyin: Zuò jiéyùn dào Xìnyì Qū hěn fāngbiàn.
examples.english: It’s very convenient to take the MRT to Xinyi District.
